gremlins

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Brickwall, Creature, Exit, Portal, Projectile, Snowball, Stonewall

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    GameObject class, the parent class for all objects in the game. Includes shared variables such as coordinates and sprite, as well as common methods such as draw and getters and setters. Also include a generic method used for checking collisions.

      • checkOverlap

        public <T extends GameObject> boolean checkOverlap(java.util.ArrayList<T> list)
        Generic method used for checking collisions between 'this' and any objects. Loop through all objects in given list. List can be of any type of game objects. Collision is checked by getting the edges of both objects then checks for overlap.
        Parameters:
        list - list of objects to check
        Returns:
        whether there is overlap or not
